about_the_game:
The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault - Supporter Pack 1, offers users 6 new, exclusive skins for the following weapons:

  • Revolver

  • SMG

  • Shotgun

  • Assault Rifle

  • Sniper

  • Battle Rifle

The skin, known as "Bloody mess “, shows that the user isn't afraid of getting up close and personal against the wasteland's most notorious creatures that walk the dead lands of the dry Victorian tundra.

This pack also allows the user to unlock an exclusive green laser colour for the corresponding attachment, complimenting both the new look and style of the weapon.

These new customization options can be accessed in the weapons inspection tab, in the main menu.
